channel.title: Water on OSSTD doc
channel.description: Recent content in Water on OSSTD doc

item.title: Water Connections
item.description: User Data CSV File: userdata_wateruse_connections.csv (82 B) userdata_wateruse_connections.json (1 KB) Introduction The userdata_wateruse_connections.csv contains compliance data for hot water and cold water supply temperature schedules. The schedules are used in the simulation to calculate the water demand loads. It consists of the following data fields: name hot_water_supply_temperature_schedule cold_water_supply_temperature_schedule An example of such data can be found in below. It should be noted that the schedule name provided shall be in the user model.

item.title: Water Equip Definition
item.description: User Data CSV File: userdata_wateruse_equipment_definition.csv (76 B) userdata_wateruse_equipment_definition.json (1 KB) Introduction The userdata_wateruse_equipment_definition.csv contains compliance data the wateruse equipment definition. The object can be found in Openstudio SDK. The data file let’s user to modify data for an existing wateruse equipment definition object. It consists of the following data fields: name peak_flow_rate flow_rate_fraction_schedule target_temperature_schedule An example of such data can be found in below. It should be noted that the schedule name provided shall be in the user model.
